title: Mommy Mearest
desc: Mother of Girlfriend Gearest, wife of Daddy Dearest and Boyfriend's inevitable mother in law. This ex-popstar says to enjoy the easy, slow life, which is part of why she retired, despite constantly having coming out of retirement concerts. Ever since Boyfriend came along, her husband has been obsessed with eliminating him.

cData.desc: Old MM Key Art by EllisBros
Concepts for Springbonnie in Week 5 (these inspired MM's clothes) by Offbi
